overview: Wang An and Han Xiao eloped to Shanghai to opened a small eatery. But when Wang An passed away in an accident, Han Xiao leaves Shanghai. After 5 years, Han Xiao returned to Shanghai and found that the small eatery have been operating all these years. There she met Qi Feng, Qi Feng's cooking has a familiar taste. Since then, Han Xiao often come to Qi Feng's shop to eat, each dish reminds Han Xiao of her own past story, Qi Feng also began to share his story. The fated encounter of these two was inevitable and was connected and intertwined with Wang An.
title: Little Canteen
